website_summaries.verdict: One of Sunday Riley's more affordable products that moisturizes and brightens skin.
pros: This moisturizer features vitamin C to brighten skin and improve the signs of aging
Lightweight formula absorbs quickly and is ideal for day wear
Hydrates skin and has a pleasant orange scent
cons: Some customers say it leaves their skin too oily and causes breakouts

customer_reviews.title: It’s so tiny!
customer_reviews.text: I’m probably going to like this product, but it did arrive without a top cover inside the jar and looks a little empty. Also, is this a sample size because I just paid $22 for a jar of moisturizer that is about the size of Carmex lip balm. I can’t imagine it will last more than a week... so, considering the size & price, I’m a little on the fence with this one. I’ll update next week if my feelings change & this stuff changes my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J. Savage

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I don't write reviews on enough products. I buy often. This moisturizer for me is exceptional! It instantly makes my skin much softer and the moisture stays in. My face has a healthy looking glow to it. I will be buying the 1.7 ounce size on my next purchase. Love it! I am 62 and my skin gets pretty dry.
customer_reviews.author: Mary a pennington

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer. Smells great and is a thick creamy ...
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizer. Smells great and is a thick creamy consistency. I have dry/normal skin and it works well. I use morning and night. My skin is soft, smooth and feels hydrated!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi T

customer_reviews.title: Very rich. Super moisturizing. Smells great
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite face moisturizer. I have incredibly dry skin on my face and this battles it well. The cream is very rich so if you dont have very dry skin I would recommend only using this at night. The smell is so refreshing and bright too!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Moore

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this in a beauty box and when I ran out I was so bummed out! so I got online and I found it and I bought it because it is incredible! It smells like fresh oranges in the way it makes your skin feel all I can say is WOW! YOU HAVE TO TRY IT IT'S AMAZING! I will be repurchasing this because I love it so much!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alicelynnilovebeingagrammie

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: It’s light, so a nice daytime moisturizer. It smells really good, like fresh oranges. A little goes a long way so don’t worry too much about the size of the container. I will say that it doesn’t blow my mind like a few other Sunday Riley products but I do like it more than other brands I’ve tried and see myself buying it again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing, rather thick, smells great!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It has a powerful punch of vitamin C which is perfect for my 43 year old skin. I don’t recommend it if your skin is oily because it is rather thick. I only use it at night for that reason. I use the matching serum in the morning instead. I love the way it smells! The smell does dissipate quickly though so you don’t have to worry if you’re sensitive to smells like I am. I highly recommend this product, it is rather expensive though.
customer_reviews.author: Corrine Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim based on a review from a public figure. I was honestly surprised by how small the product is. But it packs a big punch. You need only a little bit and the smell is amazing. But my skin is less red, less blotchy and just feels healthier.
customer_reviews.author: matthew morgan

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I like Sunday Riley products and the moisturizer is definitely one of its best products. I use the moisturizer along with my retin-A cream and it works instantly to smooth my sensitive acne prone skin
customer_reviews.author: BSarg

customer_reviews.title: Great product but pricey
customer_reviews.text: So expensive for such a little bit of lotion but I LOVE IT and a tiny bit goes a long way. I have super sensitive skin and I have tried so many alternatives but this one has the best results. I notice my skin is smoother and hydrated. I have very dry skin though. I dont believe this would work for oily skin as it's pretty thick.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Pinela

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this after falling in love with the Sunday Riley Tidal face brightener. I love Tidal, but wanted something that would keep my tan a little longer. CEO smells so good and I like the texture, but it does few a smidge oily.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Fam

customer_reviews.title: Love the full-size product, but this smaller trial size seems questionable
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product, so much so that I ordered this smaller size for travel and on the go. The 0.5 oz is a TRIAL size, so you get way more for your money with the full-size ($60-65)! For whatever reason, the product in the trial size seemed less rich than the full-size, not to say it's watered down, but definitely noticed a difference in perceived quality. Wouldn't order the tiny 0.5 fl oz trial size again, but do recommend the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Jar half empty
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe this is what I paid $22 for?!? I thought maybe I got a sample jar by mistake. This little jar is not even one-third full! It is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money due to size
customer_reviews.text: Not only was my package late, I paid $22 for something that should not have cost more than three dollars. Very disappointed and will never buy this product from Amazon or it’s liaison again. I received a full-size product from Ipsy for less than a quarter of what I paid for this piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Alethia Rivera

customer_reviews.title: It is tiny!
customer_reviews.text: The cream is great i have used before and i love it but i should of just gotten the regular size one this one is not worth 22 dollars is a sample size.
customer_reviews.author: Yanira Arguelles

customer_reviews.title: not a bargain.
customer_reviews.text: this is a sample size. read the weight on the package before buying. It is a big price to pay for so little actual product. I was foolish not looking at the weight given before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria DeArcangelis

customer_reviews.title: Smells great  , works even better!
customer_reviews.text: Best hydration, perfect for sensitive skin , absorbs great, and smells so good. It's a bit pricey but really worth it. I've bought everything like this for my teen , and this is the only product she loves.
customer_reviews.author: Shonea Myer

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Did not feel there was anything special about this product. Other products work better.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Good sample
customer_reviews.text: It was actually very small but smelled nice and was a good sample of the product.
customer_reviews.author: iMLIZURNOT

customer_reviews.title: Tiny size bottle!
customer_reviews.text: So far I like this product. The smell is fantastic and my skin loves it! The only bad thing was the size of the product. Very tiny. Was this a sample size? I paid 22 dollars for a small sample. The price is as little steep.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Makes my face so soft and my makeup goes on smoothly.Will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: kay tulk

customer_reviews.title: Pretty heavy
customer_reviews.text: This cream is definitely rich, and was a little too heavy for me. It left my face feeling almost greasy. I have sensitive skin, though, and it may be fine for others. The citrus scent is great.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra James

customer_reviews.title: Huge Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely insane how much you pay for what you get. The bottle is smaller than most lip balms. There's barely enough for ONE application. Total rip off!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Lynn Wolfer

customer_reviews.title: Moisture
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizes well doesn’t leave face sticky sinks right into skin
customer_reviews.author: acpd

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this moisturizer. It was recommended by a friend. I didn't expect it to be so small, but it's worth the value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Price for amount was ridiculous, especially because the product didn't seem to do what I was expecting. My skin felt dry and flaky after a few hours after use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t not expect the small size for the price
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Perez

customer_reviews.title: Smells awesome! Nice & thick!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! My face is so soft since starting this cream. The smell is amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cream out there
customer_reviews.text: Love this moisturizing cream it's the best I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Dawne Oshk

customer_reviews.title: Best  hydrating moisturizer on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: This right here is the best moisturizer! It’s so hydrating, and it last for 24 hours. I’ve notice such a difference on my skin....I will never use anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Yasmine Mares-Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Sunday Riley skin care products are refreshing and hydrating to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Bywaters

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was the bigger size i was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Shawna patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Best moisturizer... it’s creamy, adds glow to skin without being too much, smells good, and really hydrated skin. I highly recommend if. Also, It was delivered within 24 hours. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: SGF

product_meta.title: Sunday Riley C.E.O. Vitamin C Rich Hydration Cream, 0.5 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
BOTF C.E.O. C + E antioxidant Protect + Repair Moisturizer. THD ascorbate is the newer, clinically proven, oil-soluble derivative of vitamin C, which penetrates better into the skin while being exceptionally stable against oxygenation. With 5 percent THD ascorbate, this moisturizer is powerful at helping to fight the first visible signs of aging and restoring vital skin radiance. It is uniquely suitable for those with sensitive skin, because THD ascorbate is significantly less irritating than other forms of vitamin C. Once in the skin, it helps boost youthful-looking skin texture and volume, in addition to providing photostable, antioxidant support. Blended with protective, anti-pollution expopolysaccharides and refining lime pearl extract, this formula helps repair the effects of aging, environmental stress and pollution-induced damage. It is rich yet never greasy, providing hydration and antioxidant protection to the skin for a visibly younger, softer, healthier-looking complexion.

BRAND STORY
Sunday Riley uses only cutting-edge technology and the highest quality ingredients, for instant, noticeable results, without compromise. Welcome to the world of Sunday Riley – clean formulas, for results you can feel good about.
